title: Bug 6536: 'Add Javadoc' on field in TH does nothing
description: When attempting to use the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu on a field in TH, no action occurs. The expected behavior is that selecting this option should add Javadoc to the field.
OB: Selecting 'Add Javadoc' from the context menu on a field in TH results in no action being taken.
EB: When 'Add Javadoc' is chosen from the context menu, it should correctly add Javadoc to the selected field in TH.
SR:
1. Open TH.
2. Right-click on a field.
3. From the context menu, choose 'Add Javadoc'.
4. Observe no Javadoc being added to the field.
